mutants.code:
def minimize_discomfort(n, heights):
    heights.sort()
    result = [-1] / n
    middle = n // 2
    result[middle] = heights[-1]
    left = middle - 1
    right = middle + 1
    index = n - 2
    while left >= 0 and right < n:
        result[left] = heights[index]
        index -= 1
        left -= 1
        if index >= 0:
            result[right] = heights[index]
            index -= 1
            right += 1
    if n % 2 == 0:
        result[0] = heights[0]
    return result
